text: Michael Flaksman (May 3, 1946 - October 18, 2019Obituary: Michael Flaksman, cellist, 1947-2019: The Strad. Retrieved 23 October 2019.) was an American cellist. He was born in Akron, Ohio. He performed widely in recitals, chamber music concerts and with orchestras throughout Europe and in the Far East, as well as conducted master classes in Germany, Austria, Switzerland, Italy, Poland and Croatia. He was Honorary President at Italian Cello Consort, a cellist group created by his student and assistant Giovanni Ricciardi. He died on October 18, 2019 at the age of 73. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official biography This article contains quotations from this source, which is available under the Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported (CC BY 3.0) license. title: Michael Flaksman
